What are you guys talking about?\""},{"lineNumber":173548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ニードル、お前はどうする？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Needle, what about you? What will you do?\""},{"lineNumber":173549,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そいつは気に入らない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't like that...\""},{"lineNumber":173550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、ケイブリスの方が気に入らない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But I like Cavebris even less."},{"lineNumber":173551,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あたしらが戦う理由なんてそれで充分でしょ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's more than enough reason for us to fight.\""},{"lineNumber":173552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、そうかも知れませんね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, that might be true.\""},{"lineNumber":173553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「決めたぜ、カオスマスター！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's decided, Chaos Master!\""},{"lineNumber":173554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":173555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺ら、あんたの下につく！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We'll follow under your command!"},{"lineNumber":173556,"originalJapaneseLine":"　好きに使ってくれや！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Use us however you want!\""},{"lineNumber":173557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いらん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I don't need that.\""},{"lineNumber":173558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあまあ、そう言うなって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, don't say that.\""},{"lineNumber":173559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だー！　勝手にパーティーに入るな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn it! Don't just join the party on your own!\""},{"lineNumber":173560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、おっきいブタさんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, a big piggy."},{"lineNumber":173561,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よろしくねっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nice to meet you!\""},{"lineNumber":173562,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひえっ、魔王様だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek, it's the Demon Lord...\""},{"lineNumber":173563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつぞやは失礼を致しました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I apologize for my rudeness the other day.\""},{"lineNumber":173564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's fine.\""},{"lineNumber":173565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわっ、軽い……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, you're so light...\""},{"lineNumber":173566,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあ、私達、もっと強くなりましたね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, we've gotten stronger, haven't we?\""},{"lineNumber":173567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いらんいらん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No thanks, no thanks."},{"lineNumber":173568,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物の仲間なんていらんわい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't need monster companions.\""},{"lineNumber":173569,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But...\""},{"lineNumber":173570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしかしたら……これなら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe... with this..."},{"lineNumber":173571,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当にケイブリスにも勝てる、かも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We might actually be able to defeat Cavebris...\""},{"lineNumber":173572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、雑魚が増えたところで意味ないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, it doesn't matter if more weaklings show up.\""},{"lineNumber":173573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、こっちが近道だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, this is the shortcut!"},{"lineNumber":173574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺達についてきてくれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Follow us!\""},{"lineNumber":173575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前らが仕切るな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You guys don't get to take charge!\""},{"lineNumber":173576,"originalJapaneseLine":"地下水脈を抜けたランス達は、","translatedEnglishLine":"After passing through the underground water vein, Lance and the others"},{"lineNumber":173577,"originalJapaneseLine":"大きな扉の前に来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"arrived in front of a large door."},{"lineNumber":173578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、こっからが本番だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, this is where the real battle begins."},{"lineNumber":173579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気合いを入れて行こうぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's get fired up and go!\""},{"lineNumber":173580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ、またこれか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, this again...\""},{"lineNumber":173581,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスの部屋に近づいた途端、","translatedEnglishLine":"As soon as they approached Cavebris' room,"},{"lineNumber":173582,"originalJapaneseLine":"ねっとりとした恐瘴気が体にまとわりついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a sticky, frightening miasma clung to their bodies."},{"lineNumber":173583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うげぇ……なにこれぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... what is this...?"},{"lineNumber":173584,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぎぼぢわるい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It feels awful...\""},{"lineNumber":173585,"originalJapaneseLine":"「噂には聞いたことがあるが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've heard rumors about this..."},{"lineNumber":173586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これがケイブリスの放つ瘴気って奴か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So this is the miasma that Cavebris emits...\""},{"lineNumber":173587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確かにこりゃ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed, this is..."},{"lineNumber":173588,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かなりキツいな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"pretty harsh...\""},{"lineNumber":173589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいおい、大丈夫か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, are you okay?\""},{"lineNumber":173590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、俺はなんとかな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, I'll manage somehow..."},{"lineNumber":173591,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが周りのお嬢さん達の方が心配だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But I'm more worried about the ladies around me.\""},{"lineNumber":173592,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お前らが並ぶと死ぬほど暑苦しい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...When you guys line up, it's unbearably hot and suffocating."},{"lineNumber":173593,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あと、どっちが魔物か分からんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, I can't tell who's the monster here.\""},{"lineNumber":173594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen...\""},{"lineNumber":173595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、これに耐えられるとは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Still, to be able to withstand this,"},{"lineNumber":173596,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物共は大したもんだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"you monsters are impressive indeed...\""},{"lineNumber":173597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んなこたぁない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's not true."},{"lineNumber":173598,"originalJapaneseLine":"　恐瘴気は俺ら魔物も辛いぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"This dreadful miasma is also tough on us monsters."},{"lineNumber":173599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただ、瘴気の影響を弱める薬を飲んでるだけさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's just that we take medicine to weaken the effects of the miasma."},{"lineNumber":173600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一応、薬ならあるぜ。","translatedEnglishLine":"We've got medicine for that, just in case.\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hey, scholar, can I ask you something?"
"You don't even need to say it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、ちょうど私も同じことを考えていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was just thinking the same thing right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、お前らもそうだよなぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, you guys feel the same way too, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マッスルが後ろにいる仲間達に振り返る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muscle turned around to his comrades standing behind him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その仲間達もまた、笑みを浮かべていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those comrades also wore smiles on their faces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ？　お前らなんの話をしてんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What are you guys talking about?"
"Needle, what about you? What will you do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、ケイブリスの方が気に入らない。
あたしらが戦う理由なんてそれで充分でしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's more than enough reason for us to fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、そうかも知れませんね」
「だー！　勝手にパーティーに入るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it! Don't just join the party on your own!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつぞやは失礼を致しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I apologize for my rudeness the other day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、私達、もっと強くなりましたね」
魔物の仲間なんていらんわい」
本当にケイブリスにも勝てる、かも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We might actually be able to defeat Cavebris..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、雑魚が増えたところで意味ないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it doesn't matter if more weaklings show up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達についてきてくれ！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You guys don't get to take charge!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下水脈を抜けたランス達は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After passing through the underground water vein, Lance and the others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな扉の前に来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: arrived in front of a large door.
"Alright, this is where the real battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気合いを入れて行こうぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's get fired up and go!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの部屋に近づいた途端、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As soon as they approached Cavebris' room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ねっとりとした恐瘴気が体にまとわりついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a sticky, frightening miasma clung to their bodies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「噂には聞いたことがあるが……
これがケイブリスの放つ瘴気って奴か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is the miasma that Cavebris emits..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが周りのお嬢さん達の方が心配だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I'm more worried about the ladies around me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……お前らが並ぶと死ぬほど暑苦しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...When you guys line up, it's unbearably hot and suffocating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あと、どっちが魔物か分からんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, I can't tell who's the monster here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、これに耐えられるとは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, to be able to withstand this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物共は大したもんだな……」
恐瘴気は俺ら魔物も辛いぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This dreadful miasma is also tough on us monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、瘴気の影響を弱める薬を飲んでるだけさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just that we take medicine to weaken the effects of the miasma.
We've got medicine for that, just in case."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hey, scholar, can I ask you something?"
"You don't even need to say it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、ちょうど私も同じことを考えていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was just thinking the same thing right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、お前らもそうだよなぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, you guys feel the same way too, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マッスルが後ろにいる仲間達に振り返る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muscle turned around to his comrades standing behind him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その仲間達もまた、笑みを浮かべていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those comrades also wore smiles on their faces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ？　お前らなんの話をしてんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What are you guys talking about?"
"Needle, what about you? What will you do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、ケイブリスの方が気に入らない。
あたしらが戦う理由なんてそれで充分でしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's more than enough reason for us to fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、そうかも知れませんね」
「だー！　勝手にパーティーに入るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it! Don't just join the party on your own!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつぞやは失礼を致しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I apologize for my rudeness the other day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、私達、もっと強くなりましたね」
魔物の仲間なんていらんわい」
本当にケイブリスにも勝てる、かも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We might actually be able to defeat Cavebris..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、雑魚が増えたところで意味ないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it doesn't matter if more weaklings show up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達についてきてくれ！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You guys don't get to take charge!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After passing through the underground water vein, Lance and the others

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's get fired up and go!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As soon as they approached Cavebris' room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ねっとりとした恐瘴気が体にまとわりついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a sticky, frightening miasma clung to their bodies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが周りのお嬢さん達の方が心配だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I'm more worried about the ladies around me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……お前らが並ぶと死ぬほど暑苦しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...When you guys line up, it's unbearably hot and suffocating.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, I can't tell who's the monster here."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, to be able to withstand this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物共は大したもんだな……」
恐瘴気は俺ら魔物も辛いぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This dreadful miasma is also tough on us monsters.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just that we take medicine to weaken the effects of the miasma.
